sentences.en: A series of movies will be shown to commemorate the 30th anniversary of his death.
sentences.cn: 为纪念他逝世30周年，有一系列的电影要上映。

sentences.en: Campaigners lit scores of bonfires in ceremonies to mark the anniversary.
sentences.cn: 参加运动的人们在各种仪式上点起一垛垛篝火以纪念周年庆典。

sentences.en: He bought her a diamond ring on their tenth wedding anniversary.
sentences.cn: 他们结婚10周年纪念,他给她买了一枚钻戒.

sentences.en: It was the fortieth anniversary of the death of the composer.
sentences.cn: 这是该作曲家逝世40周年纪念日。

sentences.en: Jack and Kim celebrated their twentieth wedding anniversary in January.
sentences.cn: 1月，杰克和金庆祝了他们的结婚20周年纪念日。

sentences.en: Next year will be the 60th anniversary of the repeal of Prohibition.
sentences.cn: 明年将是禁酒令废除60周年。

sentences.en: That couple always holds a little celebration every year on their wedding anniversary.
sentences.cn: 他们夫妇每年到他们结婚的日子都要稍微庆祝一下.

sentences.en: The 200th anniversary of Mozart's death is being commemorated around the world with concerts featuring his work.
sentences.cn: 世界各地将举办以莫扎特的作品为主题的音乐会，以纪念他逝世200周年。

sentences.en: The anniversary is bound to bring a new surge of interest in Dylan's work.
sentences.cn: 该周年纪念肯定会再一次激发人们对迪伦作品的浓厚兴趣。

sentences.en: The bank celebrates its hundredth anniversary in December.
sentences.cn: 这家银行将于12月庆祝其成立100周年。
这座城市的一千周年纪念

sentences.en: The four new stamps mark the 100th anniversary of the British Astronomical Association.
sentences.cn: 这四枚新邮票是为了纪念英国天文协会成立100周年而发行的。

sentences.en: The present crop of books and documentaries about Marilyn Monroe exploit the thirtieth anniversary of her death.
sentences.cn: 时下出现的这些有关玛丽莲·梦露的书和纪录片是借她逝世30周年之际推出的。

sentences.en: They celebrate their wedding anniversary annually.
sentences.cn: 他们每年庆祝一番结婚纪念日.

sentences.en: Today is my parents'30 th wedding anniversary.
sentences.cn: 今天是我父母结婚30周年纪念日.
今天是我们的结婚纪念日。

phrases.tran_cn: 结婚纪念日；结婚周年纪念日

trans.tran_en: a date on which something special or important happened in a previous year
